name: Spine 2D Image Sequence Creator
description:
This is a plugin, of sorts, for the Spine 2D Esoteric Animation Software.

How to use Spine 2D Image Sequence Creator:

1.) Place the application in your Spine Project Folder next to the spine project file

2.) Run the application

3.) Browse the folder containing the images you'd like to sequence and set all settings (output name, frame rate and image format)

4.) Click on "Create Sequence File"

5.) Import the  created json file into your project (via menu->Import Data)

Done!

Programmed by Matt Ostgard, interface by Lion In A Box Games!
